hibernate-mapping.query: from User u where u.identifier= :username and u.realm.identifier = :realmname
from Role s where LOWER(s.identifier) = LOWER(:role) and s.realm.identifier = :realmname
from Role s where LOWER(s.identifier) = LOWER(:role)
from RoleHierarchy rh where LOWER(rh.descendantRole.identifier) = LOWER(:role)
from RoleHierarchy rh where rh.role.identifier = :role and rh.descendantRole.identifier= :descendantRole
from RoleHierarchy rh where rh.role.identifier = :role or rh.descendantRole.identifier= :descendantRole
